weather.precipitation: Winter in Salzburg typically brings snowfall, creating a picturesque snowy landscape.
weather.what_to_pack: Pack warm winter clothing, including thermal layers, waterproof boots, gloves, scarves, and hats.

tourism.crowds: Winter in Salzburg sees fewer tourists compared to peak seasons like summer, offering a more tranquil experience.
tourism.costs: Accommodation and attraction prices are generally lower in winter compared to peak seasons.
tourism.booking_advice: Book accommodations in advance, especially around Christmas and New Year's. Check for winter-specific attractions and events.

highlights.name: Salzburg Christmas Market
highlights.description: One of Europe's most charming Christmas markets with festive stalls, mulled wine, and traditional crafts.
highlights.tips: Visit in the evening for the magical atmosphere.

highlights.name: New Year's Concerts
highlights.description: Enjoy classical music concerts in venues across the city to welcome the new year.

highlights.name: Winter Wonderland at Hellbrunn Palace
highlights.description: Experience a winter wonderland with ice skating, snow sculptures, and seasonal treats.
highlights.tips: Dress warmly and have fun on the ice rink.

highlights.name: Mozart Week
highlights.description: A celebration of Mozart's music with concerts and performances throughout the city.
highlights.tips: Attend a concert at iconic venues like the Mozarteum.

highlights.name: Fasching Carnival
highlights.description: Celebrate the Austrian carnival season with colorful parades, costumes, and festivities.
highlights.tips: Join in the carnival spirit and attend a masked ball.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Winter offers prime skiing conditions in the nearby Alps with multiple ski resorts to choose from.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Book ski passes and equipment rentals in advance. Take lessons if you're a beginner.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Experience the stunning ice formations in the world's largest ice cave, which maintains its icy beauty in winter.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Wear sturdy shoes and warm clothing. Check tour availability due to weather conditions.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Enjoy peaceful winter hikes through snow-covered landscapes in the picturesque Salzkammergut region.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Wear appropriate winter hiking gear and check trail conditions.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Warm up indoors with a delightful evening of Mozart's music and a gourmet dinner.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Make reservations in advance. Dress elegantly for the occasion.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Experience a unique perspective of Salzburg's winter wonderland from high above in a hot air balloon.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Book a reputable balloon company. Dress warmly for the altitude.

recommended_activities.why_this_season: Unwind in thermal spas like Aqua Salza or Rupertus Therme for a relaxing escape from the winter chill.
recommended_activities.practical_tips: Check spa timings and bring your swimwear and flip-flops.

not_recommended: Outdoor activities without proper winter gear
Visiting outdoor attractions during heavy snowstorms
